title: Club +1
content:
Club +1 Uncommon 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A long, deep crack runs through the side of the wood, filled with crusted blood. Club Light 0.9 40

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A long, deep crack runs through the side of the wood, filled with crusted blood.

Club +1 is one of the Club Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Club +1 is an enchanted club. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages
